Name: road maintenance | road maintenance | EN15804GD, U
Category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/421:Construction of roads and railways/4210:Construction of roads and railways
Description: In order to account for the environmental interventions due to road operation and maintenance generic data for the Swiss road infrastructure is employed. The figures presented are based on inventories generated by Maibach et al. (1999). The data is presented for 1 meter of road and 1 year. Different road types have been distinguished; namely motorway (Nationalstrassen) and three different classes (1st class road, 2nd class road and 3rd class road) of the Swiss Road network. For all categories, the expenditures for operation and maintenance are recorded. 1500t of solvent containing paint per year is used on Swiss roads, 25% of which is solvent based.
